Class GradeBook

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Class that implements student`s grade book.

      • GradeBook

        public GradeBook​(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String surname,
                 java.lang.String faculty,
                 int completedSemesters)
        Default constructor of grade book.
        Parameters:
        name - - name of the student
        surname - - surname of the student
        faculty - - faculty of the student
        completedSemesters - - count of semesters, that student had already complete

    • Method Detail

      • getAvgGrade

        public float getAvgGrade()
        Method that counts average grade for all semesters.
        Returns:
        - average grade for all semesters

      • willBeScholarship

        public boolean willBeScholarship()
        Method that analyze grades and decide, will be scholarship in next semester or not.
        Returns:
        true - will be scholarship, false - won`t be.

      • setGraduateWorkGrade

        public void setGraduateWorkGrade​(int grade)
        Method that sets mark for graduate work.
        Parameters:
        grade - - will be grade for graduate work

      • willBeRedDiploma

        public boolean willBeRedDiploma()
        Method that analyze grades and decide, will be red diploma or not. You cannot have red diploma, before you pass graduated work. You cannot pass graduated work, before you end 8 semesters. So you cannot have red diploma, before you end 8 semesters.
        Returns:
        true - will be red diploma, false - won`t be

      • addGrade

        public void addGrade​(java.lang.String subject,
                     Grade grade,
                     int semesterNumber,
                     SubjectType type)
        Method that adds grade in current semester. You cannot add grades in semesters, that you had not complete. If you want to add grade in (N+1) semester, but you completed only (N) semesters, you first need to increase your semester by method increaseSemester().
        Parameters:
        subject - - will be subject for this grade
        grade - - will be grade for this subject
        semesterNumber - - in which semester we need to add pair (subject,grade)

      • getSubjectsCount

        public int getSubjectsCount​(int semesterNumber)
        Getter for subject count in current semester.
        Parameters:
        semesterNumber - - in what semester we need to know count of subjects
        Returns:
        count of subjects in current semester

      • increaseSemester

        public void increaseSemester()
        Method, that increase completed semesters for this student. That allows him to add grades for (i+1) semester, where i - current semester.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Represent grade book as a string.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string representation of grade book
